com.openfeint.api.resource
Class Achievement

java.lang.Object
  com.openfeint.internal.resource.Resource
      com.openfeint.api.resource.Achievement

public class Achievement
extends com.openfeint.internal.resource.Resource

The resource class that represents an Achievement in OpenFeint. You use this class to:

  • Get the list of Achievements that were created on the Developer Dashboard for this application,
  • Query whether the local user has unlocked an achievement, or
  • Unlock an Achievement for the local user.

          A callback class you can extend for calling downloadIcon().

public int position
If you've specified an Achievement ordering on the Developer Dashboard, this is the position of this Achievement in the list of this Achievement.

Constructor Detail

Achievement

public Achievement(java.lang.String resourceID)
Create a local Achievement object with the given resource ID. This won't automatically fill the other fields out - see Achievement.list() if you want to consult other fields of the Achievement.

Parameters:
resourceID - The resource ID of an Achievement that was created for this game on the Developer Dashboard.

Achievement

public Achievement()
This constructor is for use by the parser only.

Method Detail

list

public static void list(Achievement.ListCB cb)
Call this method to get a list of Achievements that are available to your application. These are the Achievements that you've created on the Developer Dashboard.

Parameters:
cb - The callback object that will be given the list of Achievements.

downloadIcon

public void downloadIcon(Achievement.DownloadIconCB cb)
Call this method to download the icon of the given Achievement, in android.graphics.Bitmap format.

Parameters:
cb - The callback object that will be given the Bitmap of the icon.

unlock

public void unlock(Achievement.UnlockCB cb)
Call this method to unlock this Achievement for the currently logged-in user.

Parameters:
cb - An optional callback object that will be notified when Achievement unlocking succeeds or fails.

updateProgression

public void updateProgression(float pctComplete,
                              Achievement.UpdateProgressionCB cb)
Call this method to update the progression on this Achievement for the currently logged-in user.

Parameters:
pctComplete - The percentage completion, between 0.0f and 100.0f.
cb - An optional callback object that will be notified when Achievement updating succeeds or fails. Note that if you provide a pctComplete outside of the 0.0f..100.0f range, it will be clamped, but if you try to update the progression value to a lower value, onFailure() will be called instead of onSuccess().

load

public void load(Achievement.LoadCB cb)
Call this method to fill out the fields of this Achievement object. If you've created an Achievement with the (String resourceID) constructor and then call this method, all the remaining Achievement fields will be filled out for the Achievement represented by that resource ID.

Parameters:
cb - The callback object that will be notified when load() completes.

getResourceClass

public static com.openfeint.internal.resource.ResourceClass getResourceClass()
This method is used internally by OpenFeint.
